title: Installer Aborts itself half way through/Installer wont start unless downloaded with IE
body:
Hello,

Last week i had a critical Windows Error and had to repair my Windows which didnt quite work as planned. 
Yesterday i reinstalled everything from scratch and now League of Legends is the only Programm that cannot be installed.

When downloaded with IE:
-Installer starts
-Half way(sometimes even at the installation start) through the progress Bar it aborts the installation itself giving me the Option to Retry or Abort
(http://imgur.com/a/2iByr)

When downloaded with FF/GC:
-Installer doesnt start whatsoever
-Cannot start it with changing the Properties 

Also i only found old fixes which no longer work from 2009-2014
**
Edit:**
Somehow managed to install it with 
http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseEUW.exe

Lets see if its playable

replies.body:
Yes

Had to download the remaining 6GB tho
